name: Shoot the Monster
description:
1. Press the 'Play' button to start. 
  2. Press the right arrow key to move anti-clockwise and the left arrow key to move clockwise. 
  3. Press the space bar to shoot. 
  4. There are 5 levels in total. 
  5. Defeat the monster in the 5th level to win.
  6. You can see the monster's health and your health on the top left corner.
